sentences.cn: 别张着嘴傻瞪着,太不礼貌了!
别张著嘴傻瞪著,太不礼貌了!

sentences.en: He looks down at the gape void at his feet.
sentences.cn: 他看著脚下张开的裂缝.

sentences.en: He must be a very strange - looking camel driver for people to gape like that.
sentences.cn: 他必定是个很奇怪的拉骆驼的,他想;要不然,大家为什么这样呆呆的看着他呢?

sentences.en: He that gapes till he be fed will gape till he be dead.
He was not the type to wander around gaping at everything like a tourist.
sentences.cn: 他不是那种像个游客似的四处闲逛、惊奇地看着一切的人。

sentences.en: His secretary stopped taking notes to gape at me.
sentences.cn: 他的秘书停止了记录，目瞪口呆地望着我。

sentences.en: The front door was missing. A hole gaped in the roof.
sentences.cn: 前门没有了，屋顶裂开一个洞。

trans.tran_cn: 张口结舌地看，目瞪口呆地凝视 ，张开，裂开
trans.tran_en: If you gape, you look at someone or something in surprise, usually with an open mouth
